title: I just realized old Poppy had a place in this game...

embed.description: Here's how to play Poppy if you don't want to be dumb bruiser.

body:
She wasn't meant to be a tank. She wasn't meant to be a wall. She wasn't meant to have AoE and tiny knockups and no damage.
She was meant to be an assassin.
With lower HP, almost every lategame attack does at least 10% of your maximum HP. That's like a tiny end of the bar! With her Q critting and being magic damage, a oneshot build with Void staff and crit burst makes her amazing! She had movement speed burst, a gapcloser that can *maybe* cc to lock down an ADC for a second or so, and her ult gave her a bit of protection while she dived onto the backline and oneshot the ADC with her critting and her magic pen and her stattikk shiv. She was PERFECT. She was beautiful and you killed her, Riot.

(This video made me realize that she could be an assassin. Then I started thinking about her kit...)

EDIT: Are you all Malphite mains? You must be - you have rocks in your heads. Literally 0 sense of humor.

Man old Poppy was so fun, but it was kinda broken tbh.{{item:3078}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3153}}
I liked the champion she used to be. Unfortunately, being different means having "no counterplay" and being "toxic to playa against," thus Riot removes such champions and gameplay. Refer to Sion.

Poppy's issue was that she had virtually NO counterplay, had her ult been reworked into something like a malzahar passive, where you take reduced damage from spells and block cc for a certain amount of time, it wouldn't be that bad compared to being able to ult the support janna and charge at the backline.

She was an anti-carry, while being the trolliest champ in league and I played the crap out of her.
1. First aspect people hated was her passive, which would make her misleadingly tanky and bait people to their doom unless True damage was used.
2. She could make it so the ADC never saw the light of day,  she was an assassin who'd kill people in broad daylight with witnesses all around.
3. Combining the 2 you could go kill the ADC and then walk out.

The song " Take on me" by Aha describes Old Poppy

Riot could have kept Poppy as a Diver pretty easily, but for whatever reason they turned her into a Tank instead.

All they would have had to do is make it so Poppy's Ult makes it so *her* damage only works on the ulted target rather than letting her molest the whole enemy team after Ulting Soraka or whatever.  It would have been an enforced duel, which is my understanding of what the skill was intended to do.

And you know, funny thing about it?

Even over in Dominionland Poppy was never more than pretty good at best.  And that map catered to her about as hard as possible with the non-existent farm and ample walls.  Most full VGUs have felt more like a failure in imagination than anything else.
